title: Monsters with non-unique appearance
data:
This is a list of monsters whose appearance (i.e., combination of glyph and color) is non-unique. Variants may use different monster colors or allow you to change them (for example, using the [MONSTERCOLOR](/wiki/MONSTERCOLOR "MONSTERCOLOR") option in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack") and on [nethack.alt.org](/wiki/Nethack.alt.org "Nethack.alt.org")).

It was originally stored in a [pastebin](http://danceb.in/wkvMKONJ4hGEHVn4l9DNYg), but it might be more useful on the wiki.

Many of the @ and @ are quest leaders/nemeses; as there will only be one of each per game, the list will be somewhat shorter when considering just one individual game. Monsters in *italics* are unlikely to appear in a given game: quest leaders, quest guardians, non-guaranteed unique monsters, or monsters which are otherwise very rarely seen.

(Sorted by glyph, then color, then base level, then monster name.)

- &: [incubus](/wiki/Incubus "Incubus"), [succubus](/wiki/Succubus "Succubus"), [bone devil](/wiki/Bone_devil "Bone devil"), [sandestin](/wiki/Sandestin "Sandestin")
- &: [Death](/wiki/Death "Death"), [Famine](/wiki/Famine "Famine"), [Pestilence](/wiki/Pestilence "Pestilence"), [Yeenoghu](/wiki/Yeenoghu "Yeenoghu"), [Orcus](/wiki/Orcus "Orcus"), [Baalzebub](/wiki/Baalzebub "Baalzebub"), [Asmodeus](/wiki/Asmodeus "Asmodeus"), *[Demogorgon](/wiki/Demogorgon "Demogorgon"), [Geryon](/wiki/Geryon "Geryon"), [Dispater](/wiki/Dispater "Dispater")*
- &: [erinys](/wiki/Erinys "Erinys"), [marilith](/wiki/Marilith "Marilith"), [barbed devil](/wiki/Barbed_devil "Barbed devil"), [vrock](/wiki/Vrock "Vrock"), [hezrou](/wiki/Hezrou "Hezrou"), [nalfeshnee](/wiki/Nalfeshnee "Nalfeshnee"), [pit fiend](/wiki/Pit_fiend "Pit fiend"), [balrog](/wiki/Balrog "Balrog"), *[Minion of Huhetotl](/wiki/Minion_of_Huhetotl "Minion of Huhetotl"), [Nalzok](/wiki/Nalzok "Nalzok")*
- ': [rope golem](/wiki/Rope_golem "Rope golem"), [leather golem](/wiki/Leather_golem "Leather golem"), [wood golem](/wiki/Wood_golem "Wood golem"), [clay golem](/wiki/Clay_golem "Clay golem")
- ': [glass golem](/wiki/Glass_golem "Glass golem"), [iron golem](/wiki/Iron_golem "Iron golem")
- ': [straw golem](/wiki/Straw_golem "Straw golem"), [gold golem](/wiki/Gold_golem "Gold golem")
- :: [iguana](/wiki/Iguana "Iguana"), [baby crocodile](/wiki/Baby_crocodile "Baby crocodile"), [chameleon](/wiki/Chameleon "Chameleon"), [crocodile](/wiki/Crocodile "Crocodile")
- :: [gecko](/wiki/Gecko "Gecko"), [lizard](/wiki/Lizard "Lizard")
- ;: [piranha](/wiki/Piranha "Piranha"), [kraken](/wiki/Kraken "Kraken")
- @: *[Dark One](/wiki/Dark_One "Dark One"), [Grand Master](/wiki/Grand_Master "Grand Master")*
- @: [captain](/wiki/Captain "Captain"), [guard](/wiki/Guard "Guard")
- @: [elf-lord](/wiki/Elf-lord "Elf-lord"), [Oracle](/wiki/Oracle_\(monster\) "Oracle (monster)")
- @: [Green-elf](/wiki/Green-elf "Green-elf"), [Medusa](/wiki/Medusa "Medusa")
- @: [Grey-elf](/wiki/Grey-elf "Grey-elf"), [soldier](/wiki/Soldier "Soldier"), [watchman](/wiki/Watchman "Watchman")
- @: [Woodland-elf](/wiki/Woodland-elf "Woodland-elf"), [lieutenant](/wiki/Lieutenant "Lieutenant"), [watch captain](/wiki/Watch_captain "Watch captain"), *[Neferet the Green](/wiki/Neferet_the_Green "Neferet the Green")*
- @: [Elvenking](/wiki/Elvenking "Elvenking"), [Wizard of Yendor](/wiki/Wizard_of_Yendor "Wizard of Yendor"), [Croesus](/wiki/Croesus "Croesus"), *[Ashikaga Takauji](/wiki/Ashikaga_Takauji "Ashikaga Takauji"), [Master Assassin](/wiki/Master_Assassin "Master Assassin"), [Thoth Amon](/wiki/Thoth_Amon "Thoth Amon"), [Hippocrates](/wiki/Hippocrates "Hippocrates"), [King Arthur](/wiki/King_Arthur "King Arthur"), [Lord Carnarvon](/wiki/Lord_Carnarvon "Lord Carnarvon"), [Lord Sato](/wiki/Lord_Sato "Lord Sato"), [Master of Thieves](/wiki/Master_of_Thieves "Master of Thieves"), [Norn](/wiki/Norn "Norn"), [Orion](/wiki/Orion "Orion"), [Pelias](/wiki/Pelias "Pelias"), [Shaman Karnov](/wiki/Shaman_Karnov "Shaman Karnov"), [Master Kaen](/wiki/Master_Kaen "Master Kaen")*
- @: [werejackal (human)](/wiki/Werejackal_\(human\) "Werejackal (human)"), [sergeant](/wiki/Sergeant "Sergeant")
- @: [nurse](/wiki/Nurse "Nurse"), [aligned priest](/wiki/Aligned_priest "Aligned priest"), [high priest](/wiki/High_priest "High priest"), [shopkeeper](/wiki/Shopkeeper "Shopkeeper"), [doppelganger](/wiki/Doppelganger "Doppelganger"), *[human](/wiki/Human "Human"), [abbot](/wiki/Abbot "Abbot"), [acolyte](/wiki/Acolyte "Acolyte"), [apprentice](/wiki/Apprentice "Apprentice"), [attendant](/wiki/Attendant "Attendant"), [chieftain](/wiki/Chieftain "Chieftain"), [guide](/wiki/Guide "Guide"), [hunter](/wiki/Hunter "Hunter"), [neanderthal](/wiki/Neanderthal "Neanderthal"), [ninja](/wiki/Ninja "Ninja"), [page](/wiki/Page "Page"), [roshi](/wiki/Roshi "Roshi"), [student](/wiki/Student "Student"), [thug](/wiki/Thug "Thug"), [warrior](/wiki/Warrior "Warrior"), [archeologist](/wiki/Archeologist "Archeologist"), [barbarian](/wiki/Barbarian "Barbarian"), [caveman](/wiki/Caveman "Caveman"), [cavewoman](/wiki/Cavewoman "Cavewoman"), [elf](/wiki/Elf "Elf"), [healer](/wiki/Healer "Healer"), [knight](/wiki/Knight "Knight"), [monk](/wiki/Monk "Monk"), [priest](/wiki/Priest "Priest"), [priestess](/wiki/Priestess "Priestess"), [ranger](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger"), [rogue](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue"), [samurai](/wiki/Samurai "Samurai"), [tourist](/wiki/Tourist "Tourist"), [valkyrie](/wiki/Valkyrie "Valkyrie"), [wizard](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard"), [prisoner](/wiki/Prisoner "Prisoner"), [Twoflower](/wiki/Twoflower "Twoflower"), [Arch Priest](/wiki/Arch_Priest "Arch Priest")*
- A: [Aleax](/wiki/Aleax "Aleax"), [ki-rin](/wiki/Ki-rin "Ki-rin")
- B: [raven](/wiki/Raven "Raven"), [vampire bat](/wiki/Vampire_bat "Vampire bat")
- D: [baby black dragon](/wiki/Baby_black_dragon "Baby black dragon"), [black dragon](/wiki/Black_dragon "Black dragon")
- D: [baby blue dragon](/wiki/Baby_blue_dragon "Baby blue dragon"), [blue dragon](/wiki/Blue_dragon "Blue dragon")
- D: [baby gray dragon](/wiki/Baby_gray_dragon "Baby gray dragon"), [gray dragon](/wiki/Gray_dragon "Gray dragon")
- D: [baby green dragon](/wiki/Baby_green_dragon "Baby green dragon"), [green dragon](/wiki/Green_dragon "Green dragon")
- D: [baby orange dragon](/wiki/Baby_orange_dragon "Baby orange dragon"), [orange dragon](/wiki/Orange_dragon "Orange dragon")
- D: [baby red dragon](/wiki/Baby_red_dragon "Baby red dragon"), [red dragon](/wiki/Red_dragon "Red dragon"), *[Ixoth](/wiki/Ixoth "Ixoth")*
- D: [baby white dragon](/wiki/Baby_white_dragon "Baby white dragon"), [white dragon](/wiki/White_dragon "White dragon")
- D: [baby yellow dragon](/wiki/Baby_yellow_dragon "Baby yellow dragon"), [yellow dragon](/wiki/Yellow_dragon "Yellow dragon")
- D: [baby silver dragon](/wiki/Baby_silver_dragon "Baby silver dragon"), [silver dragon](/wiki/Silver_dragon "Silver dragon")
- F: [shrieker](/wiki/Shrieker "Shrieker"), [violet fungus](/wiki/Violet_fungus "Violet fungus")
- H: [ettin](/wiki/Ettin "Ettin"), [minotaur](/wiki/Minotaur "Minotaur")
- H: [stone giant](/wiki/Stone_giant "Stone giant"), *[Cyclops](/wiki/Cyclops "Cyclops")*
- H: [titan](/wiki/Titan "Titan"), *[Lord Surtur](/wiki/Lord_Surtur "Lord Surtur")*
- K: [Keystone Kop](/wiki/Keystone_Kop "Keystone Kop"), [Kop Sergeant](/wiki/Kop_Sergeant "Kop Sergeant")
- L: [master lich](/wiki/Master_lich "Master lich"), [arch-lich](/wiki/Arch-lich "Arch-lich")
- M: [orc mummy](/wiki/Orc_mummy "Orc mummy"), [human mummy](/wiki/Human_mummy "Human mummy")
- M: [gnome mummy](/wiki/Gnome_mummy "Gnome mummy"), [dwarf mummy](/wiki/Dwarf_mummy "Dwarf mummy")
- N: [black naga hatchling](/wiki/Black_naga_hatchling "Black naga hatchling"), [black naga](/wiki/Black_naga "Black naga")
- N: [guardian naga hatchling](/wiki/Guardian_naga_hatchling "Guardian naga hatchling"), [guardian naga](/wiki/Guardian_naga "Guardian naga")
- N: [red naga hatchling](/wiki/Red_naga_hatchling "Red naga hatchling"), [red naga](/wiki/Red_naga "Red naga")
- N: [golden naga hatchling](/wiki/Golden_naga_hatchling "Golden naga hatchling"), [golden naga](/wiki/Golden_naga "Golden naga")
- S: [cobra](/wiki/Cobra "Cobra"), [pit viper](/wiki/Pit_viper "Pit viper")
- Y: [ape](/wiki/Ape "Ape"), [owlbear](/wiki/Owlbear "Owlbear")
- Y: [monkey](/wiki/Monkey "Monkey"), [sasquatch](/wiki/Sasquatch "Sasquatch")
- Z: [kobold zombie](/wiki/Kobold_zombie "Kobold zombie"), [gnome zombie](/wiki/Gnome_zombie "Gnome zombie")
- Z: [human zombie](/wiki/Human_zombie "Human zombie"), [skeleton](/wiki/Skeleton "Skeleton")
- d: [jackal](/wiki/Jackal "Jackal"), [coyote](/wiki/Coyote "Coyote"), [werejackal (animal)](/wiki/Werejackal_\(animal\) "Werejackal (animal)"), [werewolf (animal)](/wiki/Werewolf_\(animal\) "Werewolf (animal)"), [wolf](/wiki/Wolf "Wolf"), [warg](/wiki/Warg "Warg")
- d: [winter wolf cub](/wiki/Winter_wolf_cub "Winter wolf cub"), [winter wolf](/wiki/Winter_wolf "Winter wolf")

- [Monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Monsters with non-unique appearance

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

This is a list of monsters whose appearance (i.e., combination of glyph and color) is non-unique. Variants may use different monster colors or allow you to change them (for example, using the MONSTERCOLOR option in UnNetHack and on nethack.alt.org).

It was originally stored in a pastebin, but it might be more useful on the wiki.

Many of the @ and @ are quest leaders/nemeses; as there will only be one of each per game, the list will be somewhat shorter when considering just one individual game. Monsters in italics are unlikely to appear in a given game: quest leaders, quest guardians, non-guaranteed unique monsters, or monsters which are otherwise very rarely seen.

(Sorted by glyph, then color, then base level, then monster name.)

  • &: incubus, succubus, bone devil, sandestin
  • &: Death, Famine, Pestilence, Yeenoghu, Orcus, Baalzebub, Asmodeus, Demogorgon, Geryon, Dispater
  • &: erinys, marilith, barbed devil, vrock, hezrou, nalfeshnee, pit fiend, balrog, Minion of Huhetotl, Nalzok
  • ': rope golem, leather golem, wood golem, clay golem
  • ': glass golem, iron golem
  • ': straw golem, gold golem
  • :: iguana, baby crocodile, chameleon, crocodile
  • :: gecko, lizard
  • ;: piranha, kraken
  • @: Dark One, Grand Master
  • @: captain, guard
  • @: elf-lord, Oracle
  • @: Green-elf, Medusa
  • @: Grey-elf, soldier, watchman
  • @: Woodland-elf, lieutenant, watch captain, Neferet the Green
  • @: Elvenking, Wizard of Yendor, Croesus, Ashikaga Takauji, Master Assassin, Thoth Amon, Hippocrates, King Arthur, Lord Carnarvon, Lord Sato, Master of Thieves, Norn, Orion, Pelias, Shaman Karnov, Master Kaen
  • @: werejackal (human), sergeant
  • @: nurse, aligned priest, high priest, shopkeeper, doppelganger, human, abbot, acolyte, apprentice, attendant, chieftain, guide, hunter, neanderthal, ninja, page, roshi, student, thug, warrior, archeologist, barbarian, caveman, cavewoman, elf, healer, knight, monk, priest, priestess, ranger, rogue, samurai, tourist, valkyrie, wizard, prisoner, Twoflower, Arch Priest
  • A: Aleax, ki-rin
  • B: raven, vampire bat
  • D: baby black dragon, black dragon
  • D: baby blue dragon, blue dragon
  • D: baby gray dragon, gray dragon
  • D: baby green dragon, green dragon
  • D: baby orange dragon, orange dragon
  • D: baby red dragon, red dragon, Ixoth
  • D: baby white dragon, white dragon
  • D: baby yellow dragon, yellow dragon
  • D: baby silver dragon, silver dragon
  • F: shrieker, violet fungus
  • H: ettin, minotaur
  • H: stone giant, Cyclops
  • H: titan, Lord Surtur
  • K: Keystone Kop, Kop Sergeant
  • L: master lich, arch-lich
  • M: orc mummy, human mummy
  • M: gnome mummy, dwarf mummy
  • N: black naga hatchling, black naga
  • N: guardian naga hatchling, guardian naga
  • N: red naga hatchling, red naga
  • N: golden naga hatchling, golden naga
  • S: cobra, pit viper
  • Y: ape, owlbear
  • Y: monkey, sasquatch
  • Z: kobold zombie, gnome zombie
  • Z: human zombie, skeleton
  • d: jackal, coyote, werejackal (animal), werewolf (animal), wolf, warg
  • d: winter wolf cub, winter wolf
  • d: fox, hell hound pup, hell hound
  • d: little dog, dog, large dog
  • f: kitten, housecat, large cat
  • h: dwarf king, mind flayer, master mind flayer
  • i: manes, imp
  • q: mumak, titanothere, baluchitherium
  • r: sewer rat, giant rat, rabid rat, wererat (animal), woodchuck
  • s: giant spider, Scorpius
  • u: pony, horse, warhorse
  • w: baby long worm, long worm
  • w: baby purple worm, purple worm

See also

  • Monster

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.4.3. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Monsters_with_non-unique_appearance&oldid=168312"

rawPage:
This is a list of monsters whose appearance (i.e., combination of glyph and color) is non-unique. Variants may use different monster colors or allow you to change them (for example, using the [[MONSTERCOLOR]] option in [[UnNetHack]] and on [[nethack.alt.org]]).

It was originally stored in a [http://danceb.in/wkvMKONJ4hGEHVn4l9DNYg pastebin], but it might be more useful on the wiki.

Many of the {{white|@}} and {{magenta|@}} are quest leaders/nemeses; as there will only be one of each per game, the list will be somewhat shorter when considering just one individual game.  Monsters in ''italics'' are unlikely to appear in a given game: quest leaders, quest guardians, non-guaranteed unique monsters, or monsters which are otherwise very rarely seen.

(Sorted by glyph, then color, then base level, then monster name.)

* {{gray|&}}: [[incubus]], [[succubus]], [[bone devil]], [[sandestin]]
* {{magenta|&}}: [[Death]], [[Famine]], [[Pestilence]], [[Yeenoghu]], [[Orcus]], [[Baalzebub]], [[Asmodeus]], ''[[Demogorgon]], [[Geryon]], [[Dispater]]''
* {{red|&}}: [[erinys]], [[marilith]], [[barbed devil]], [[vrock]], [[hezrou]], [[nalfeshnee]], [[pit fiend]], [[balrog]], ''[[Minion of Huhetotl]], [[Nalzok]]''
* {{brown|'}}: [[rope golem]], [[leather golem]], [[wood golem]], [[clay golem]]
* {{cyan|'}}: [[glass golem]], [[iron golem]]
* {{yellow|'}}: [[straw golem]], [[gold golem]]
* {{brown|:}}: [[iguana]], [[baby crocodile]], [[chameleon]], [[crocodile]]
* {{green|:}}: [[gecko]], [[lizard]]
* {{red|;}}: [[piranha]], [[kraken]]
* {{black|@}}: ''[[Dark One]], [[Grand Master]]''
* {{blue|@}}: [[captain]], [[guard]]
* {{brightblue|@}}: [[elf-lord]], [[Oracle (monster)|Oracle]]
* {{brightgreen|@}}: [[Green-elf]], [[Medusa]]
* {{gray|@}}: [[Grey-elf]], [[soldier]], [[watchman]]
* {{green|@}}: [[Woodland-elf]], [[lieutenant]], [[watch captain]], ''[[Neferet the Green]]''
* {{magenta|@}}: [[Elvenking]], [[Wizard of Yendor]],  [[Croesus]], ''[[Ashikaga Takauji]], [[Master Assassin]], [[Thoth Amon]], [[Hippocrates]], [[King Arthur]], [[Lord Carnarvon]], [[Lord Sato]], [[Master of Thieves]], [[Norn]], [[Orion]], [[Pelias]], [[Shaman Karnov]], [[Master Kaen]]''
* {{red|@}}: [[werejackal (human)]], [[sergeant]]
* {{white|@}}: [[nurse]], [[aligned priest]], [[high priest]], [[shopkeeper]], [[doppelganger]], ''[[human]], [[abbot]], [[acolyte]], [[apprentice]], [[attendant]], [[chieftain]], [[guide]], [[hunter]], [[neanderthal]], [[ninja]], [[page]], [[roshi]], [[student]], [[thug]], [[warrior]], [[archeologist]], [[barbarian]], [[caveman]], [[cavewoman]], [[elf]], [[healer]], [[knight]], [[monk]], [[priest]], [[priestess]], [[ranger]], [[rogue]], [[samurai]], [[tourist]], [[valkyrie]], [[wizard]], [[prisoner]], [[Twoflower]], [[Arch Priest]]''
* {{yellow|A}}: [[Aleax]], [[ki-rin]]
* {{black|B}}: [[raven]], [[vampire bat]]
* {{black|D}}: [[baby black dragon]], [[black dragon]]
* {{blue|D}}: [[baby blue dragon]], [[blue dragon]]
* {{gray|D}}: [[baby gray dragon]], [[gray dragon]]
* {{green|D}}: [[baby green dragon]], [[green dragon]]
* {{orange|D}}: [[baby orange dragon]], [[orange dragon]]
* {{red|D}}: [[baby red dragon]], [[red dragon]], ''[[Ixoth]]''
* {{white|D}}: [[baby white dragon]], [[white dragon]]
* {{yellow|D}}: [[baby yellow dragon]], [[yellow dragon]]
* {{brightcyan|D}}: [[baby silver dragon]], [[silver dragon]]
* {{magenta|F}}: [[shrieker]], [[violet fungus]]
* {{brown|H}}: [[ettin]], [[minotaur]]
* {{gray|H}}: [[stone giant]], ''[[Cyclops]]''
* {{magenta|H}}: [[titan]], ''[[Lord Surtur]]''
* {{blue|K}}: [[Keystone Kop]], [[Kop Sergeant]]
* {{magenta|L}}: [[master lich]], [[arch-lich]]
* {{gray|M}}: [[orc mummy]], [[human mummy]]
* {{red|M}}: [[gnome mummy]], [[dwarf mummy]]
* {{black|N}}: [[black naga hatchling]], [[black naga]]
* {{green|N}}: [[guardian naga hatchling]], [[guardian naga]]
* {{red|N}}: [[red naga hatchling]], [[red naga]]
* {{yellow|N}}: [[golden naga hatchling]], [[golden naga]]
* {{blue|S}}: [[cobra]], [[pit viper]]
* {{brown|Y}}: [[ape]], [[owlbear]]
* {{gray|Y}}: [[monkey]], [[sasquatch]]
* {{brown|Z}}: [[kobold zombie]], [[gnome zombie]]
* {{white|Z}}: [[human zombie]], [[skeleton]]
* {{brown|d}}: [[jackal]], [[coyote]], [[werejackal (animal)]], [[werewolf (animal)]], [[wolf]], [[warg]]
* {{cyan|d}}: [[winter wolf cub]], [[winter wolf]]
* {{red|d}}: [[fox]], [[hell hound pup]], [[hell hound]]
* {{white|d}}: [[little dog]], [[dog]], [[large dog]]

* {{brown|r}}: [[sewer rat]], [[giant rat]], [[rabid rat]], [[wererat (animal)]], ''[[woodchuck]]''
* {{magenta|s}}: [[giant spider]], ''[[Scorpius]]''
* {{brown|u}}: [[pony]], [[horse]], [[warhorse]]
* {{brown|w}}: [[baby long worm]], [[long worm]]
* {{magenta|w}}: [[baby purple worm]], [[purple worm]]
